Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication.regionserver

Class TestMetaRegionReplicaReplicationEndpoint

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication.regionserver.TestMetaRegionReplicaReplicationEndpoint
public class TestMetaRegionReplicaReplicationEndpoint extends Object
Tests RegionReplicaReplicationEndpoint class for hbase:meta by setting up region replicas and verifying async wal replication replays the edits to the secondary region in various scenarios.
See Also:
  • TestRegionReplicaReplicationEndpoint

    • doesNotContain

      private boolean doesNotContain(List<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.Cell> cells, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.TableName tableName)
      Cells are from hbase:meta replica so will start w/ 'tableName,'; i.e. the tablename followed by HConstants.DELIMITER. Make sure the deleted table is no longer present in passed cells.

    • verifyReplication
